name: Facebook in Calibri (unified font)
description: Anyone of you who have Office 2007 and found them self to simply love the font Calibri used in Outlook? Well, I did and I decided to make a unified font style for Facebook (which I also love). I also had to adjust the font sizes a bit. I'd love some comments/feedback!
